name: Ooey Gooey Butter Cake
author: Charlotte Hooper

ingredients.name: pkg. yellow cake mix (Aldi brand makes best)

instructions: Melt butter, add cake mix and 2 eggs. Mix well and pat into pre- pared cookie sheet. Soften cream cheese and add powdered sugar and 2 eggs. Beat well. Pour on top of cake mixture. Bake at 350Â° for 30 to 35 minutes or until top is cracked.
